
**************************************************************
*            Stride Performance Test Results                 *
**************************************************************

Testing on 10000 array elements each of size 4 bytes with stride 1.
Total array size is 40000 bytes.

Elements in the array are accessed with write/read pairs.
This is done first on element[0], then element [1] and so on.
The entire process is repeated 4 times.

No sum of array elements was maintained. All simulated cache 
traffic was from array accesses.

Total element accesses: 80000  (40000 read and 40000 write)
Total bytes accessed: 320000


==============================================================
          Aggregate Cache and Performance Statistics
==============================================================

Simulated Cache Characteristics:
--------------------------------

Lines=64  Associativity=1 (direct mapped)  Block_size=1024
Total cache size is: 65536 bytes

The simulated cache is a "write-back" type: dirty blocks are not written
to memory until evicted, at which time a "write_for_eviction"
is recorded. When a line is written partially, then a
"read_for_write" accounts the need to read the line from
memory before updating it.

Performance Results:
--------------------

Accesses=80000  Hits=79960 (99.9%)
Read Misses=0 (0.0%) Write Misses=40 (0.1%)  Evictions=0
Reads=40000  Writes=40000  Reads_for_writes=40  Writes_for_evictions=0
Dirty blocks remaining=40

Time for hits=79.96us  Time for memory reads=4.00us
Time for memory writes (including flushing dirties)=5.20us
Estimated total memory access time:   With caching=89.16us   No caching=9.20ms
Speedup: 103.2x


==============================================================
          Contents of individual cache line controls
==============================================================

Tag has 48 bits

Line  Valid   Dirty Tag
    0   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
    1   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
    2   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
    3   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
    4   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
    5   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
    6   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
    7   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
    8   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
    9   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   10   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   11   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   12   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   13   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   14   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   15   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   16   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   17   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   18   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   19   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   20   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   21   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   22   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   23   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   24   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   25   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   26   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   27   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   28   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   29   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   30   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   31   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   32   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   33   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   34   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   35   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   36   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   37   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   38   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   39   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   40 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   41 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   42 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   43 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   44 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   45 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   46 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   47 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   48 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   49 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   50 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   51 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   52 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   53 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
